channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Shoddy repair to wall, 31st July
item.description:
After a excellent repair to the metal safety barrier between pavement and road outside No 196 Ellenborough Road why was the support wall under barrier not repaired as well? The bricks from the demolished wall have just been left lose on the pavement and are a hazard. I would hope the cars insurance paid for the repair and has this NOT been signed off yet.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ellenborough Road, North Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish back on pavement again, 31st July
item.description:
Bins are in place but rubbish is being left on the pavement instead of being put inside.

item.title: Resident gate broken - Waston Close, 31st July
item.description:
The resident gate for parking has broken for around 3 months. The gate is for the Watson Close flat and is between Watson close and Bishops Court on Matthias Road. Car park is constantly overflowing so there are no spaces for actual residents.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Watson Close, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No street cleansing done as it should have been today, 31st July
item.description:
Another Thursday, and again the litter is not picked up, both sides of road, whole road please do full street cleansing as it should be done each week
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southlands Road, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Weeds growing like trees, 31st July
item.description:
Can’t remember last time Lancaster estate was cleaned and weeded, weeds everywhere, stairs wells are disgustingly dirty , rubbish everywhere in park on stairs on grass , No one seems to clean our estate anymore, it’s months since stairs have been cleaned , can’t remember when weeds were cleared like I said there growing into trees !!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lancaster Street, Elephant and Castle, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Southwark council bin being used to incorrectly reserve car parking space belonging to 28 Pickwick Road. Concerned!, 31st July
item.description:
Silver Mercedes belonging to 28 Pickwick Road. Southwark Council bins being used to reserve incorrectly a parking space outside the house. This is a long standing issue. Please can you investigate and rectify. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pickwick Road, Dulwich Village, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dug up pavement, 31st July
item.description:
The pavement was dug up for tree roots, but has been in the unrepaired condition for 3 weeks. The yellow barriers have fallen over and are a trip hazard or are used as a footpath!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 89, South Hill Road, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Memorial tree snapped - Hoblingwell Wood Recreation Ground, 31st July
item.description:
A sapling that was planted in remembrance circa 2022 has been snapped. This is located east of the Hoblingwell Pump Track. The damaged section has been removed and disposed of. Please could this be inspected and any necessary remedial action taken.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Leesons Way, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside 55/56 Minster RD, 31st July
item.description:
This hole looks more like subsidence in the road and measures approx LxBxH =50 x 50 x 14 cms. It has been there for a while.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 53, Minster Road, West Hampstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vegetation obstructing footway - Leesons Way, 31st July
item.description:
Vegetation is overhanging the footway, reducing its width. This obstruction is exacerbated when ground is saturated in the winter months. Please could this be inspected and any necessary remedial action taken?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 57, Leesons Way, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet
